election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1790 State Senate, Montgomery County

overview.note: The General Advertiser, and Political, Commercial, Agricultural and Literary Journal (Philadelphia, PA) reports 1266 votes for Lindsay Coates.
The General Advertiser, and Political, Commercial, Agricultural and Literary Journal (Philadelphia, PA) uses the spelling Lindsey for Lindsay Coates.
The Pennsylvania Packet, and Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) uses the spelling Lindsley Coats for Lindsay Coates.

election_record.reference: Journal of the Pennsylvania State Senate. 4.
The Federal Gazette and Philadelphia Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). October 14, 1790.
General Advertiser, and Political, Commercial, Agricultural and Literary Journal (Philadelphia, PA). October 15, 1790.
The Pennsylvania Packet, and Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). October 15, 1790.
The Pennsylvania Mercury and Universal Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). October 16, 1790.
The Freeman's Journal: or, the North-American Intelligencer (Philadelphia, PA). October 20, 1790.
